title: @Rito: Will there be a bundle with all the new Bilgewater skins?
body: All the new Bilgewater skins look quite good, and I intend to pick up a few of them. But before I do I want to make sure that a bundle isn't just around the corner. Is there any plans on releasing a bundle with all the new skin during/soon after this event?

replies.body: Hey Laughing Fish! Glad you like the Bilgewater skins. Go ahead and pick up the ones you like; there won't be a bundle on them as part of the event.
Thank you for the reply! I went ahead and bought a couple. Now to wait for a Captain Fortune...
